resources.string: create table users (id integer primary key autoincrement, iduser integer, login text, password text, name text, surname text, usercode text, addtime text)
create table tasks (id integer primary key autoincrement, idtask integer, name text, description text, addtime text, begintime text, endtime text, priority integer, status integer)
create table users_tasks (id integer primary key autoincrement, iduser integer, idtask integer)
